title: '26 to Exceed '25 for Exits: Apollo's David Sambur
description: David Sambur, partner and co-head of equity at Apollo, discusses the 2026 deal outlook with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close.” He expects 2026 to be an even bigger year for exits than last year. (Source: Bloomberg)
